description: Defines the 'Note' class representing a note object within the application, including serialization methods and properties.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a note with properties such as id, title, content, timestamps, and associated tags, with methods for serialization and copying.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the Note object into a Map suitable for database storage.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Note instance from a Map, with optional tags.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Note instance with optional new values for its properties.
